name: Brew Pub, The
text:
THE BREW PUB - THUNDER BAY, ONTARIO
Fried Green Pickles - in-house sauce. 9.5
Baked Brie - red pepper jelly. 16
Prime Rib Meatballs - reduced bourbon sauce, w smeared mashed potato. 15
Dip Trio - garlic hummus, roasted red pepper dip, and fresh guacamole, all house made, served w tortilla chips and toasted flatbread. 18
Braised Beef Buffalo Dip - tender braised beef, buffalo sauce, cream cheese, melted marble cheese, served w pita bread and crispy tortilla chips. 18
Pierogies - locally sourced, potato and cheese dumplings, homemade just like баба used to make. Served w sour cream, bacon, and onions. 16
BBQ Braised Beef Poutine - house cut fries topped with prime rib braised in our house-made whiskey BBQ sauce, cheese curds, pickled onions and horseradish aioli. 20
Mac and Cheese - house-made and top-secret beer sauce, w gratin. 16
Wings - choice of sauce - mild, medium, hot, whiskey bbq, dry cajun, dry salt n pepper. 16
Loaded Nachos - house-made chips, braised prime rib, bacon, jalapenos, green onions, roasted red peppers, tomato, green olives w salsa and sour cream. 23
Summer Greens Mix - pecans, strawberry, vinaigrette, goat cheese. 15 Add Chicken 7
The Pub Double - two 4oz patties topped with cheese, bacon, pickles, lettuce, tomato, frizzled onions, and mayo. 20
Braised Sammy - our braised and pulled prime rib topped with coleslaw. 19
Steak Sandwich - 8oz Sirloin, with sweet and sour peppers and goat cheese. 24
Butter Chicken - the real deal w traditional spices, chicken, rice, and naan bread. 18
Coconut Curry - linguine noodles, shrimp, green onion, peanuts, red thai curry sauce. 18
Steak Frites - 5oz NY Strip, creole shrimp and potato wedges. 29
Moose Print - Our very own bun recipe, deep fried, with cinnamon, ice cream, and caramel. 8
Cheesecake - Homemade and delicious - topped w berry, caramel, or chocolate. 11
